EmailTemplate.description: Lead owner and partner contact should receive a notification one week before it expires and then again on the day that it expires.
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Lead Expiration Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive Insights Lead Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.Partner_Contact__c}, Your lead registration for {!Lead.Name} {!LeadCompany} is about to expire, as we have not received any activity updates from you. If you are continuing to pursue this prospect, please document your activities on the lead by creating a new task through the Partner Community, within the next week. You can log a task by clicking on the lead name, and click new task.
The Adaptive Insights Channel Team
Follow us!
